EmailTemplate.description: Notification to leadership team on new Grant that needs review
EmailTemplate.name: Grant Approval Email Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: A new grant is ready for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A new grant for {!Opportunity.Account} is awaiting your approval. Please click the link below to open the opportunity and review. https://peopleincorporated--dev.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity/{!Opportunity.Id}/view 1. After opening the record, hover over the Approval History related list 2. Click the Approval Grant Request with Status Pending 3. Click Approve or Reject on the request
